data.text: @rarebeverage Oh hun, wishing you a speedy recovery 🖤
@rarebeverage A tender hug and lots of beverages your way. May you recover with no lasting effects. Glad the vaccine helped, glad you're going to be okay.
@rarebeverage I feel your pain. I had covid 2 months ago and the fatigue is still killing me
@rarebeverage I'm so sorry you have this. Feel better soon. Sending you a huge hug ❤❤ https://t.co/PyHJRCi81Q
@rarebeverage I’m so sorry. Sending you lots of love
@rarebeverage 0/10… do not like. Hope you’re on the mend soon

@rarebeverage Get some rest hun, take the time your body needs to heal itself. i had it before Xmas & it was only mid-end Jan that i fully got my energy back, plus i had a ‘sticky’ throat which took ages to clear 😩

@beelzeBudtender It's ok. It could have been so much worse if I hadn't been vaccinated. If I don't do anything apart from lay in bed watching documentaries, I don't feel too bad, just tired. It all goes wrong when I try to move.
